sect1.para: The rule for signature matching at call and execution join points is unchanged from AspectJ 1.2: a call or execution pointcut matches if the signature pattern matches at least one of the signatures of the join point, and if the modifiers of the method or constructor are matched by any modifier pattern or annotation pattern that may be present.
